document_data.name: Dwarf's Pot Inn
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Dwarf's Pot Inn''' was an inn in the city of [[Elturel]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

It was cheap and stank so bad it concealed the smell of the sewers.

In [[1366 DR]], it was frequented by the master thief [[Janol Famisso|Pinch]].
